alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 12:36AM EDT until July 25 at 1:45AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Crawford County in northwestern Pennsylvania... * Until 145 AM EDT. * At 1235 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Linesville to 6 miles northwest of Kinsman, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Meadville, Titusville, Linesville, Harmonsburg, Adamsville, Guys Mills, Pymatuning North, Pymatuning Central, Atlantic, Cochranton, Saegertown, Conneaut Lake, Jamestown, Hydetown, Blooming Valley, Townville, Conneaut Lakeshore, Geneva and Hartstown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
